name: Sprint Car Dirt Track Game Free
name_original: Sprint Car Dirt Track Game Free
description:
Sprint Car game in 3d comes to IOS!
Sprint Car Dirt Track Racing is for all those mud slinging fans, slide around corners just as they do in real life. Sprint Car Racing fun to it's extreme! race with 8 cars on 8 tracks with more to come! if your a fan of sprint car racing then this game is definitely for you, racing around a dirt track has never been so much fun!

Features:
- 3D Sprint Car racing with physics just like the real thing
- Touch or tilt steering controls
- 5 different view settings
- Select the amount of laps per race
- Free Practice mode
- Easy, Medium or Hard levels for AI
- Lap times for trackin your best laps
- Regular updates will include more tracks, cars, and game modes including championship coming soon!
